entry.p: For some sobering thoughts on what's in store with regard to the economy and society, I highly recommend the following essays that came across my radar today:

ul.li: Debt and Deflation by Van R. Hoisington and Lacy H. Hunt
Buddy, Can You Spare $5 Trillion? by John Mauldin
A 20-Year Bear Market? by David Galland

entry.p: Grokking all three in fullness will drive any notions of "green shoots" right out of your head.
UPDATE: The Economy Is Even Worse Than You Think (WSJ)
